fields.description:
Observed cases, where in tasks within same vertex were competing with each and getting killed

{noformat}

issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

fields.summary: LLAP: WaitQueue comparators should return 0 when tasks of the same DAG are of same priority
